prompt: Create a bold, centered, print-ready flat vector illustration on a vibrant hot pink solid background, isolated artwork only; no garment, no mockup, no fabric, no shadows. Include a thick black vector-style outline around the isolated elements (text and graphics) ONLY; do NOT add a square frame or border around the entire image. Main graphic: a cute, chubby smiling cactus with rounded pads, simple kawaii face with large black eyes and white highlights and a small smile, a small soft-pink flower on top, short white spine marks, sitting in a simple round brown pot; surround the cactus with scattered small green triangles and tiny star sparkles as decorative confetti. Typography: bold, chunky friendly all-caps display type, high legibility, heavy black outline matching the graphic outline, white fill with bright lime-green inner stroke on emphasized words, slight arch for the top lines and strong stacked rectangular alignment for the bottom lines, balanced kerning and compact leading for a tight print composition. Layout and hierarchy: top arched headline, second arched subhead directly below, central cactus graphic, then a small centered line above a large emphasized word and a final centered word below, all centered composition with even vertical spacing; ensure the large emphasis word dominates visually. Use flat colors, crisp vector edges, no textures, no gradients, print-ready separation of colors for screen printing. TEXT Hungarian: "TÜRELEM" (above) "RÓZSÁT TEREM" (above) "NEKEM" (above) "KAKTUSZ" (above) "JUTOTT".
negative_prompt: no mockup, no clothing, no fabric texture, no shadows, no photorealism, no background details, no frame or border, t-shirt mockup, hoodie mockup, garment, fabric texture, wrinkles, folds, shadows, photo, model, background scene, studio lighting

debug.extracted_text_raw: TÜRELEM RÓZSÁT TEREM NEKEM KAKTUSZ JUTOTT
debug.notes: All words are clearly legible and follow the stacked layout: top 'TÜRELEM', second 'RÓZSÁT TEREM', then 'NEKEM', large emphasis 'KAKTUSZ', and final 'JUTOTT'. Accents (Ó, Á) are visible.
